name: Memories.ai
tagline: ChatGPT for your video library, with unlimited video context
description: Introducing the worldâ€™s first Large Visual Memory Model - AI that sees and remembers video like ChatGPT does with text. Upload to Memories.ai and search or ask questions anytime.

name: Tender
tagline: Like tinder, but only photos of my wife & only right swipes
description: Swipe through your favorite photos of your loved ones. Create albums, share memories, and spread love - one swipe at a time.

name: Opal
tagline: Describe, create, and share your AI mini-apps
description: Introducing Opal, our new way to help you build and share AI mini-apps by linking together prompts, models, and toolsâ€” all while using simple, natural language (without a single line of code ðŸ¤¯)

name: Golex AI
tagline: Turn ideas into interactive demo websites
description: Golex AI turns your ideas, PRDs, or UI references into interactive website prototypesâ€”no coding or complex prompts needed. Just share your vision, and Golex smartly creates the full user flow and design. Perfect for pitches, reviews, and validation

name: Parsagon
tagline: AI to track and analyze public policy
description: Discover unique insights and generate custom reports on public policy in any jurisdiction. Customers use us to analyze changes in US state education policy, generate reports on UK financial regulations, monitor vaccine policies across the EU, and much more!

name: DocsBot
tagline: AI agents built for seamless support
description: DocsBot is the all-in-one platform for building and deploying AI Agents that handle customer support, reduce tickets, and deliver fast, accurate answers, 24/7.

name: camelAI Embedded
tagline: Embed chat with your data in your product
description: Embed AI analytics chat in your product in minutes. camelAI API + iframe lets users chat with their data, get instant insights & charts. Connect any database. Start free.

name: Frigade AI
tagline: In-app support that adapts to your product automatically
description: Frigade AI is an in-app agent that guides users, answers questions, and takes action, right inside your UI. It learns your product by using it, updates itself as you ship, and delivers personalized, real-time help with zero ongoing engineering effort.

name: Create tab in Google Photos
tagline: Bring your memories to life
description: Google Photos is adding a new "Create tab," a hub for new AI tools. Features include "Photo to video" (powered by Veo 2) to animate your static images and "Remix" to transform pictures into fun art styles.

name: Nortonâ„¢ Neo
tagline: Your first safe AI-native browser
description: Neo is the first AI-native browser that makes your online life 10x smarter. Features Magic Box AI control center, Tabless Browsing, Peek summaries, Ad Blocker, and AI Typing Assistant. It's like having a smart friend ready to help you explore the internet.

name: Fluensa
tagline: Make the entire internet a space for language learning
description: Learn languages right where you browse. Fluensa lets you instantly translate any word on any website, see pronunciation, examples, and practice with mini-quizzes â€” all without leaving the page. Make the internet your language classroom!

name: Linkbird
tagline: AI Agents for LinkedIn outreach that wonâ€™t get you blocked
description: AI agents for LinkedIn that understand what you sell and who you should target. They craft hyper-personalised outreach and handle follow-ups safely - no bans, no spam. Starts at $19 monthly. Built by founders tired of overpriced, risky tools.

name: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0
tagline: The SOTA performance of simultaneous interpretation models
description: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0 by ByteDance is an end-to-end, speech-to-speech simultaneous interpretation model. It delivers human-level accuracy and ultra-low latency (2-3 seconds) for Chinese-English translation, with real-time voice replication.

name: MeetHub
tagline: Book meeting rooms from Slack
description: Use /book slash command to book your office meeting rooms. Check room's schedule, avoid double bookings and get 10-minute reminders. Reschedule or cancel your bookings with just a few clicks. Let admins manage the rooms.

name: Gabriel Operator
tagline: Turns browser actions into AI agents to automate tasks
description: Meet Gabriel Operator â€“ your Digital Angel that turns browser actions into AI agents. No code, no APIs. Just record, customize, and let your agent automate web tasks like filling forms, scraping data, logging in & more. A new era of personal automation.

name: Chord
tagline: Add AI to your groupchats
description: The only way to chat with AI and friends together by adding AI bots right into your groupchats. AI adds super powers to your groupchats, from helping choose a restaurant to eat at, to settling debates, or just roasting your friends.

name: Magic Patterns
tagline: Prototype new features with AI
description: Build prototypes, get user feedback, and make data-driven decisions. The AI prototyping platform for product teams.

name: Geneo
tagline: Your 24/7 AI search radar for instant GEO wins
description: ðŸš€ Geneo helps you analyze and boost your brand's visibility in AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews. See what queries mention you, track competitors, and get actionable tips to rank better in AI answers.

name: Nina AI
tagline: Your True AI Secretary
description: Nina is a personal AI assistant that remembers what matters, integrates with any tool, and handles the boring stuff so you can focus on what matters. Schedule meetings, book restaurants, send reminders, and more, all from one intelligent, contextual hub.

name: GTM Alpha Consultation
tagline: Get a 30-60-90 day GTM roadmap in 2 minutesâ€”free
description: Turn "GTM feels broken" into a clear 90-day roadmap in 2 minutes. Built for founders and CXOs, using proven EPIC framework that's doubled startup pipelines. Get instant expert analysis from CMO + personalized action plan. Free alternative to $5K+ GTM audits.
